mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, writer) VALUES ('${title}', '${content}', ${writer})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, u.id AS writer, u.name AS writerName, b.title, b.content, b.wdate FROM board b LEFT JOIN users u on (b.writer = u.id)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET content = '${content}' where id = ${id}
